about_the_game:
Shaintar: Thundering Skies


Violent, unexplained storms batter the coast of Shaintar, Smashing into towns with incredible ferocity. It is the start of the Tempest, and there's nothing natural about the extreme weather descending on the realm.

Tell the story of heroes battling the greatest of evils in Thundering Skies, the first published campaign setting for Shaintar. The stakes have never been higher - or more dangerous - for the Tempest represents a terrible foe that seems unstoppable. Even Ceynara, the Queen of Hell, casts a wary eye upon the forces of the Tempest.

Be prepared, for the skies are Thundering!

With this book you have the tools to set the scene and tell the story of a full Plot Point Campaign. You'll find plenty of new player options, background on events and locations, a hoste of Savage Tales, and a bestiary full of NPC Enemy stat blocks related to the Tempest in Shaintar.

Some links in this product require Shaintar GM's Guide, Shaintar Player's Guide, Shaintar Legends Unleashed GM's Guide, and Shaintar Legends Unleashed Player's Guide.

Writing: Howard Brandon, Darren Pearce and Drew Wendell

Rules: Howard Brandon, Brett Smith;

Edits: Gayle Reick, Miles Kantir;

Art: Alida Saxon, Bien Flores, Carl Holden, Chris Bivins

Layout: Alida Saxon

Converted by: Leonid Ponomarev

Released on June 19, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
